name: Hytale
author: info@blstmo.com
description: Hytale is a sandbox game by Hypixel Studios that combines building, fighting, and adventure in an epic fantasy world. This egg supports dedicated Hytale servers following the official Hytale Server Manual.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
apt-get update
apt-get install -y curl jq unzip

cd /mnt/server

# Download hytale-downloader tool
echo "Downloading Hytale Downloader tool..."
curl -sSL -o hytale-downloader.zip https://downloader.hytale.com/hytale-downloader.zip
unzip -o hytale-downloader.zip -d hytale-downloader
chmod +x hytale-downloader/hytale-downloader-linux-amd64
rm hytale-downloader.zip

# Create default server.properties if it doesn't exist
if [ ! -f "server.properties" ]; then
    cat > server.properties << 'EOF'
# Hytale Server Properties
server-name=Hytale Server
server-port=5520
max-players=20
view-distance=10
gamemode=survival
difficulty=normal
pvp=true
allow-flight=false
enable-whitelist=false
enable-query=true
EOF
    echo "Created default server.properties"
fi

# Create world directory if it doesn't exist
mkdir -p world

echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo "Hytale Server Installation"
echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo ""
echo "The Hytale Downloader tool has been installed to:"
echo "  ./hytale-downloader/hytale-downloader-linux-amd64"
echo ""
echo "To download server files, run in the console:"
echo "  ./hytale-downloader/hytale-downloader-linux-amd64"
echo ""
echo "First-time setup: You'll see a URL and authorization code."
echo "Open the URL in a browser to authenticate with your Hytale account."
echo ""
echo "After downloading, extract the Server folder contents and Assets.zip"
echo "to your server directory."
echo ""
echo "Refer to: https://support.hytale.com/hc/en-us/articles/45326769420827-Hytale-Server-Manual"
echo "-----------------------------------------"
